PHRASE.LANG: Water enters the region from all sides
Water enters the region from all sides
Water enters the region from all sides
L'eau arrive dans la zone par tous les côtés.

A local official was gunned down yesterday in the @R region. Many have speculated that his recent comments regarding the @F could have provided the motivation for the attack. The assassin has yet to be found, but surveillance records show that @P had engaged in meetings with the @F recently, and is considered a prime suspect.

A local official was gunned down yesterday in the @R region. Many have speculated that his recent comments regarding the @F could have provided the motivation for the attack. The assassin has yet to be found, but surveillance records show that @P had engaged in meetings with the @F recently, and is considered a prime suspect.

A local official was gunned down yesterday in the @R region. Many have speculated that his recent comments regarding the @F could have provided the motivation for the attack. The assassin has yet to be found, but surveillance records show that @P had engaged in meetings with the @F recently, and is considered a prime suspect.

Un haut fonctionnaire a été abattu hier dans la région @R. De nombreuses personnes pensent que ses derniers commentaires sur la faction @F pourrait être la cause de l'attaque. L'assassin n'a pas encore été arrêté, mais les caméras de surveillance montrent que @P a récemment assisté à plusieurs rencontres avec @F. C'est le suspect n°1.
Water enters the region from three sides
Water enters the region from three sides
Water enters the region from three sides
L'eau arrive dans la zone par trois côtés.
Water enters the region from two sides
Water enters the region from two sides
Water enters the region from two sides
L'eau arrive dans la zone par deux côtés.

An assassination attempt was foiled yesterday in the @R region. Through careful investigation, @T discovered the nefarious plot before it could be put into action. The information gathered by @T was passed to local officials who were able to intervene and prevent any bloodshed from occurring. Though the would-be assassin was not apprehended, @P is believed to be the most likely suspect.

The information gathered by @T was passed to local officials who were able to intervene and prevent any bloodshed from occurring. Though the would-be assassin was not apprehended, @P is believed to be the most likely suspect.

An assassination attempt was foiled yesterday in the @R region. Through careful investigation, @T discovered the nefarious plot before it could be put into action. The information gathered by @T was passed to local officials who were able to intervene and prevent any bloodshed from occurring. Though the would-be assassin was not apprehended, @P is believed to be the most likely suspect.

Une tentative d'assassinat a été déjouée hier dans la zone de @R. Suite à l'enquête de @T, tous les détails du plan ont été révélés avant qu'il ne soit mis en marche. Les informations rassemblées par @T ont été communiquées aux autorités locales, désormais prêtes à intervenir pour empêcher tout bain de sang. Bien que l'assassin présumé n'ait pas été arrêté, de lourds soupçons pèsent sur @P.
The region includes a bus stop
The region includes a bus stop
The region includes a bus stop
La zone possède un arrêt de bus.
The mercenary in question is under 40
The mercenary in question is under 40
The mercenary in question is under 40
Le mercenaire recherché a moins de 40 ans.

Local officials have noted a marked rise in violence in the @R region recently. It is thought that the increased conflicts stem from the widespread gun running that has become so prevalent in the @R. Reports that the @F have acquired a large shipment of illegal weapons as recently as this week have yet to be confirmed, but authorities are currently seeking @P for questioning.

Local officials have noted a marked rise in violence in the @R region recently. It is thought that the increased conflicts stem from the widespread gun running that has become so prevalent in the @R. Reports that the @F have acquired a large shipment of illegal weapons as recently as this week have yet to be confirmed, but authorities are currently seeking @P for questioning.

Local officials have noted a marked rise in violence in the @R region recently. It is thought that the increased conflicts stem from the widespread gun running that has become so prevalent in the @R. Reports that the @F have acquired a large shipment of illegal weapons as recently as this week have yet to be confirmed, but authorities are currently seeking @P for questioning.

Les autorités ont remarqué une recrudescence des actes de violence dans la zone @R. Cette augmentation notable serait due à la spectaculaire croissance du trafic d'armes dans la zone @R. Il semblerait que @F soit en possession d'une vaste cargaison d'armes, bien que pour l'instant, rien n'ait encore été confirmé. Les autorités sont actuellement à la recherche de @P pour l'interroger.

It is always easier to track down information with the help of a friend. You can choose to band together with other players in order to track down the mercenary. 

To team up, open your notebook 
with [SQUARE] and press [CIRCLE]. You'll see a list of all the other players currently in the game. Select a name from the list, and press [CROSS] to offer partnership. 

The other player can either accept or refuse the offer. If they accept, you will gain all of the information they have uncovered and they will gain all of yours. If either of you correctly guess the details of the event, both of you will receive credit for winning. Any number of players can share sources, up to everyone in the current game.

To team up, open your notebook 
with [SQUARE] and press [CIRCLE]. You'll see a list of all the other players currently in the game. Select a name from the list, and press [CROSS] to offer partnership. 

The other player can either accept or refuse the offer. If they accept, you will gain all of the information they have uncovered and they will gain all of yours. If either of you correctly guess the details of the event, both of you will receive credit for winning. Any number of players can share sources, up to everyone in the current game.

Il est plus facile de trouver des informations si vous faites équipe avec un ami. S'allier avec d'autres joueurs permet de traquer plus facilement le mercenaire. 

Pour former une alliance, appuyez sur[SQUARE] 
 pour ouvrir votre bloc-notes, puis appuyez sur [CIRCLE]. Une liste de tous les autres joueurs présents apparaît. Choisissez un nom dans la liste puis appuyez sur[CROSS] 
 pour faire une demande d'alliance. 

L'autre joueur peut accepter ou refuser votre offre. S'il accepte, vous partagerez les informations que vous avez réunies. Si l'un d'entre vous fait la bonne hypothèse, vous serez tous les deux considérés comme gagnants. Vous pouvez partager vos informations avec tous les joueurs, si vous le souhaitez.
The action is to take place along the eastern border
The action is to take place along the eastern border
The action is to take place along the eastern border
L'opération doit se dérouler le long de la frontière est.
you are now sharing sources with
you are now sharing sources with
you are now sharing sources with
vous partagez désormais vos sources avec
This is usually done for political reasons, though money may be a motivating factor
This is usually done for political reasons, though money may be a motivating factor
This is usually done for political reasons, though money may be a motivating factor
Les raisons sont souvent politiques, même si l'argent est un facteur non négligeable.
At least one funeral is guaranteed if this person isn't stopped soon
At least one funeral is guaranteed if this person isn't stopped soon
At least one funeral is guaranteed if this person isn't stopped soon
Si on ne l'arrête pas rapidement, on va devoir compter les victimes.
The region includes a weapon shop
The region includes a weapon shop
The region includes a weapon shop
La zone possède un magasin d'armes.

Bring up your notebook with [SQUARE]. From here you can view all the clues you've collected so far. New clues will be granted periodically, so be sure to check your notebook often. If any other players have guessed the wrong identity, you can also view all the incorrect solutions so far. To switch between clues and wrong solutions, use [RIGHT][LEFT].

Bring up your notebook with [SQUARE]. From here you can view all the clues you've collected so far. New clues will be granted periodically, so be sure to check your notebook often. If any other players have guessed the wrong identity, you can also view all the incorrect solutions so far. To switch between clues and wrong solutions, use [RIGHT][LEFT].

Bring up your notebook with [SQUARE]. From here you can view all the clues you've collected so far. New clues will be granted periodically, so be sure to check your notebook often. If any other players have guessed the wrong identity, you can also view all the incorrect solutions so far. To switch between clues and wrong solutions, use [RIGHT][LEFT].

Ouvrez votre bloc-notes avec [SQUARE]. Ici, vous pouvez voir tous les indices réunis jusqu'à présent. Pensez à consulter votre bloc-notes régulièrement, car de nouveaux indices y seront parfois ajoutés. Lorsqu'un autre joueur se trompe sur l'identité du mercenaire, vous pouvez visualiser toutes les fausses hypothèses suggérées. Naviguez entre les indices et les fausses hypothèses avec [RIGHT][LEFT].

Piece together information in order to stop mercenaries before they strike. You take on the role of an investigative reporter such as Reuben Oluwbgwe. Use the clues you find to piece together the who, what, why, and where of an upcoming mercenary action before time runs out.

Piece together information in order to stop mercenaries before they strike. You take on the role of an investigative reporter such as Reuben Oluwbgwe. Use the clues you find to piece together the who, what, why, and where of an upcoming mercenary action before time runs out.

Piece together information in order to stop mercenaries before they strike. You take on the role of an investigative reporter such as Reuben Oluwbgwe. Use the clues you find to piece together the who, what, why, and where of an upcoming mercenary action before time runs out.

Rassemblez des informations afin d'arrêter l'attaque des mercenaires. Vous incarnez Reuben Oluwbgwe, journaliste d'investigation. Trouvez des indices afin d'obtenir tous les détails sur la prochaine attaque du mercenaire avant la fin du temps imparti.
The U.F.L.L. has no knowledge of the action
The U.F.L.L. has no knowledge of the action
The U.F.L.L. has no knowledge of the action
L'U.F.L.L. n'a aucune information sur cette exaction.

Be sure to check your notebook often, including the list of wrong solutions. Another player's wrong guess may be just what you need to help put together the final piece of the puzzle.\n\nLook around Reuben's office for clues that might provide valuable information about the mercenaries, the factions they work for, and the geography of the region.

N'oubliez pas de vérifier votre bloc-notes régulièrement, y compris la liste des fausses hypothèses. La fausse hypothèse d'un joueur peut révéler le détail qui vous manquait pour assembler toutes les pièces du puzzle.\n\nFouillez le bureau de Reuben. Vous pourriez y trouver des informations importantes sur les mercenaires, les factions pour lesquelles ils travaillent et la topographie de la région.

When you think you know who is doing what for which faction, and where it's all going down, you can attempt to solve the puzzle. To solve the puzzle, bring up your notebook with [SQUARE] and press 
[CROSS].

The notebook will go away, and you'll be returned to the corkboard to enter your solution. Pick a person, an action, a faction, and a maptile, and press [CROSS]. Press [CROSS] again to confirm your choices. 

If you've guessed correctly, you (and any players you're currently allied with) will win. If you're wrong, your solution will be entered into everyone's notebook, and you'll be locked out from guessing again for a few seconds.

When you think you know who is doing what for which faction, and where it's all going down, you can attempt to solve the puzzle. To solve the puzzle, bring up your notebook with [SQUARE] and press 
[CROSS].

The notebook will go away, and you'll be returned to the corkboard to enter your solution. Pick a person, an action, a faction, and a maptile, and press [CROSS]. Press [CROSS] again to confirm your choices. 

If you've guessed correctly, you (and any players you're currently allied with) will win. If you're wrong, your solution will be entered into everyone's notebook, and you'll be locked out from guessing again for a few seconds.

When you think you know who is doing what for which faction, and where it's all going down, you can attempt to solve the puzzle. To solve the puzzle, bring up your notebook with [SQUARE] and press 
[CROSS].

The notebook will go away, and you'll be returned to the corkboard to enter your solution. Pick a person, an action, a faction, and a maptile, and press [CROSS]. Press [CROSS] again to confirm your choices. 

If you've guessed correctly, you (and any players you're currently allied with) will win. If you're wrong, your solution will be entered into everyone's notebook, and you'll be locked out from guessing again for a few seconds.

Quand vous pensez savoir qui fait quoi, pour quelle faction et où, vous pouvez tenter de résoudre l'énigme. Pour résoudre l'énigme, ouvrez votre bloc-notes en appuyant sur [SQUARE], puis appuyez sur 
[CROSS].

Le bloc-notes disparaîtra et vous reviendrez devant le panneau pour entrer votre solution. Choisissez une personne, une action, une faction et une case de la carte, puis appuyez sur [CROSS]. Appuyez à nouveau sur [CROSS] pour confirmer votre choix. 

Si votre hypothèse est correcte, vous (et tous vos alliés) remportez la partie. Si vous vous trompez, votre hypothèse sera inscrite dans les blocs-notes de chaque joueur et vous ne pourrez plus faire d'hypothèse pendant quelques secondes.

As you gather information about the pending event, you can start to eliminate factions, people, and parts of the map. You can mark up the parts of the game board by using the directional buttons and [CROSS].

Pressing [CROSS] will cycle between: 

a red X (to mark possibilities that you've eliminated)

a green cirlce (to mark likely possibilities)

blank

Taking notes will make it a lot easier to keep track of the information you uncover.

Rassemblez des informations sur le prochain crime afin de trouver par élimination la faction, la personne et la zone de la carte concernés. Vous pouvez marquer des emplacements du plateau de jeu avec les touches directionnelles et [CROSS]. 

En appuyant sur [CROSS], vous aurez le choix entre : 

a croix rouge : pour marquer les hypothèses que vous avez éliminées

a cercle vert : pour marquer les hypothèses probables

vide

Organisez plus facilement les informations que vous avez découvertes en prenant des notes.

An explosion rocked a building in the @R region late last night. The @F is thought to be behind the attack, though they have not claimed responsibility and the possible motivating factors remain unclear. The damage was extensive, and numerous casualties have been reported. Authorities are currently seeking @P, whom they believe may have been involved in the attack, though no conclusive evidence has yet been found.

An explosion rocked a building in the @R region late last night. The @F is thought to be behind the attack, though they have not claimed responsibility and the possible motivating factors remain unclear. The damage was extensive, and numerous casualties have been reported. Authorities are currently seeking @P, whom they believe may have been involved in the attack, though no conclusive evidence has yet been found.

An explosion rocked a building in the @R region late last night. The @F is thought to be behind the attack, though they have not claimed responsibility and the possible motivating factors remain unclear. The damage was extensive, and numerous casualties have been reported. Authorities are currently seeking @P, whom they believe may have been involved in the attack, though no conclusive evidence has yet been found.

Une explosion a détruit un bâtiment dans la zone de @R, la nuit dernière. Il semblerait que @F soit derrière cette opération, bien qu'aucun de ses membres ne l'ait revendiquée et que leurs motivations restent obscures. L'ampleur des dégâts est considérable et de nombreuses victimes sont à déplorer. Tout porte à croire que @P, actuellement recherché, serait impliqué dans cette attaque, même si aucune preuve formelle n'a pu être établie.
When the wrong people and the right devices are connected, the results could be disastrous
When the wrong people and the right devices are connected, the results could be disastrous
When the wrong people and the right devices are connected, the results could be disastrous
Lorsque les bons instruments tombent entre les mains des mauvaises personnes, les conséquences peuvent s'avérer catastrophiques.

A major shipment of explosives and small arms was intercepted yesterday in the @R region. Through careful investigation, including undercover operations with members of the @F, @T pieced together details surrounding the purchase. This information was passed along to local officials, who were then able to obstruct delivery of the shipment. @P is thought to be responsible for orchestrating the deal, but could not be located for questioning.

A major shipment of explosives and small arms was intercepted yesterday in the @R region. Through careful investigation, including undercover operations with members of the @F, @T pieced together details surrounding the purchase. This information was passed along to local officials, who were then able to obstruct delivery of the shipment. @P is thought to be responsible for orchestrating the deal, but could not be located for questioning.

A major shipment of explosives and small arms was intercepted yesterday in the @R region. Through careful investigation, including undercover operations with members of the @F, @T pieced together details surrounding the purchase. This information was passed along to local officials, who were then able to obstruct delivery of the shipment. @P is thought to be responsible for orchestrating the deal, but could not be located for questioning.

Une importante cargaison d'explosifs et d'armes de poing a été interceptée hier dans la zone de @R. Grâce à des recherches et à une opération d'infiltration menée par @T au sein de @F, les détails de la transaction ont été réunis. Les informations ont été communiquées aux autorités locales, qui ont ainsi pu s'opposer à la livraison de la cargaison. On soupçonne @P d'avoir organisé la transaction, mais cet individu n'a pas pu être interrogé par les autorités locales.

A plot to destroy a building in the @R region was uncovered today due to the investigative efforts of @T. Local officials stepped in and prevented the sabotage, confiscating a large amount of explosives in the process. The suspect is a thought to be @P, a known mercenary who has recently been sighted in the area, and is currently wanted by authorities for unrelated criminal activities.

The suspect is a thought to be @P, a known mercenary who has recently been sighted in the area, and is currently wanted by authorities for unrelated criminal activities.

Un attentat à la bombe dans la zone de @R a été déjouée grâce à l'enquête de @T. Les autorités locales ont empêché l'explosion de la bombe, saisissant au passage une grande quantité d'explosifs. On soupçonne @P, un mercenaire vu récemment dans la zone, d'être à l'origine de ces actes. Il est actuellement recherché par les autorités pour des activités criminelles sans rapport avec l'enquête.
